AIX / VIOS

  • Create these users
    sudo mkuser "id=6951" "pgrp=taunix"  "home=/home/hilla016" "gecos=Andy Hill=FM-PTT"    hilla016 
sudo mkuser "id=6888" "pgrp=taunix"  "home=/home/labrar29" "gecos=Robert Labranche=FM-PTT"   labrar29
sudo mkuser "id=6699" "pgrp=taunix"  "home=/home/leedsn16" "gecos=Nathan Leeds=FM-PTT"    leedsn16
  • Set the simple password
echo "hilla016:saTxrfVn.jGMs"| sudo chpasswd -e
echo "labrar29:saEVc4lmoEEFY" | sudo chpasswd -e
echo "leedsn16:saTLnaGYqOo7Q" | sudo chpasswd -e
  • Set to no change at first login
    sudo pwdadm -c hilla016 
sudo pwdadm -c labrar29
sudo pwdadm -c leedsn16

Linux

  • Create these users
    sudo useradd -g taunix -d /home/hilla016 -c "Andy Hill " -m -u 6951 hilla016
sudo useradd -g taunix -d /home/labrar29 -c "Andy Hill " -m -u 6888 labrar29
sudo useradd -g taunix -d /home/leedsn16 -c "Andy Hill " -m -u 6699 leedsn16
  • Set the simple password
echo "hilla016:saTxrfVn.jGMs"| sudo chpasswd -e
echo "labrar29:saEVc4lmoEEFY" | sudo chpasswd -e
echo "leedsn16:saTLnaGYqOo7Q" | sudo chpasswd -e
  • Set the password expiration
    <code>sudo chage -I -1 -m 0 -M 60 -E -1 hilla016
sudo chage -I -1 -m 0 -M 60 -E -1 labrar29
sudo chage -I -1 -m 0 -M 60 -E -1 leedsn16
  • Unlock the ids
    sudo usermod -U hilla016
sudo passwd -uhilla016
sudo usermod -U labrar29
sudo passwd -u labrar29
sudo usermod -U leedsn16
sudo passwd -u leedsn16
